alert.note: Alert for Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:34AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Luzerne and southwestern Wyoming Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 434 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ricketts Glen State Park, or 16 miles north of Berwick, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Harveys Lake, Noxen, Forkston, Kasson Brook, Evans Falls, Beaumont, Lovelton, Sweet Valley and Fairmount Spgs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
